The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 27 November is 1,367,546 (2,429.6 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 22 November, there were 112,803 new confirmed cases (200.4 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 15 November, there were 150,470 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 25% (37,667 fewer cases).
